title: Futuria Fantasia, Spring 1940
creator: Ray Bradbury
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of Futuria Fantasia, Spring 1940, edited by Ray Bradbury. Read by Lois Hill. A collection of short science fiction stories, edited by Ray Bradbury. Authors include Lyle Monroe, J. E. Kelleam, Hank Kuttner, J. H. Haggard, Ron Reynolds, Damon Knight, and Hannes V. Bok. (Summary by Lois Hill) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. Download M4B (19MB)
subject: librivox; literature; audiobook; science fiction
